properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 v2 c1 v3 v4 c1 v5 v6 c1 v7 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Thayu wa Kristu
uromuikurukira,
giai na thayu na
mugie naguo muno. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kristu oimiriira
arutwo amerire,
giai na thayu na
mugie naguo muno.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Athuri ona inyui Kristu
aramwira,
giai na thayu na
mugie naguo muno.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Atumia ona inyui Kristu
aramwira,
giai na thayu na
mugie naguo muno.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Anake ona inyui Kristu
aramwira,
giai na thayu na
mugie naguo muno.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Airitu ona inyui Kristu
aramwira,
giai na thayu na
mugie naguo muno.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Na ciana ona inyui Kristu
aramwira,
giai na thayu na
mugie naguo muno.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Hindi ya thina kristu
aramwira,
giai na thayu na
mugie naguo muno.
